collections::​collection
interface
collections::​ .​collection

A collection is a <sized> <iterable> <container> that stores objects of the same type in a linear arrangement.

methods
iter
pure virtual function iterator iter()

Returns an <iterator> over the items of an <iterable>.

size
pure virtual function int size()

Returns the current size of the container.

Implementations shoud return an integer value greater or equal to 0, where 0 is returned for an empty container.

is_empty
pure virtual function bit is_empty()

Returns 1 if a collection is empty, or 0 otherwise.
